title: Spain
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 422 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 660L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     T and Y
description: Spain has a rich and varied culture, influenced by its land, people, and history. Use this engaging book to explore this interesting European country with your students.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
